    36. 
            

            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                def get_failed_count(ip_address, email)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  storage.get_failed_login_count(ip_address, email)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                def reset_failures(ip_address, email)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  storage.reset_failed_logins(ip_address, email)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                private
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                def handle_successful_login(context)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  ip_address = context[:ip_address]
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  email = context[:email]
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  storage.reset_failed_logins(ip_address, email)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  event_handler.handle_login_threat(:successful_login, context)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                def handle_failed_login(context)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  ip_address = context[:ip_address]
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  email = context[:email]
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  failed_count = storage.increment_failed_logins(ip_address, email)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  context[:failed_count] = failed_count
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  if failed_count >= config.thresholds.failed_logins
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69.

      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            

                private

      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
              1
            

            

                def load_configuration
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
              1
            

            

                  @thresholds = SuspiciousThreshold.default.validate!.freeze
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            

                  @block_durations = BlockDuration.default_minutes.validate!.freeze
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError => e
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "SecurityConfig initialization failed: #{e.message}"
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  raise SecurityConfigurationError, "Invalid security configuration: #{e.message}"
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194.

                def clear_cached_values
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  @thresholds = nil
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196.

      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  @redis_keys = nil
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  @whitelist_ips = nil
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  @log_levels = nil
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              end

              class SecurityEventHandler

                attr_reader :config, :storage

                def initialize(config: SecurityConfig.instance, storage: nil)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  @config = config
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  @storage = storage || SecurityStorage.new(config: @config)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                end
          
      11.

                def handle_threat(threat_type, context)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  severity = determine_severity_from_context(context)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  case severity
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  when :critical
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    handle_critical_threat(context)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  when :high
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    handle_high_threat(context)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  when :medium
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    handle_medium_threat(context)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  else
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    log_security_event(:unknown_threat, context)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                def handle_login_threat(threat_type, context)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  case threat_type
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  when :brute_force
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    handle_brute_force_attack(context)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  when :successful_login
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    handle_successful_login(context)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  when :failed_login
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    handle_failed_login(context)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  else
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    log_security_event(:unknown_login_threat, context)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                private
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                def handle_critical_threat(context)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  ip_address = context[:ip]
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  threats = context[:threats] || []
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  duration = determine_block_duration(threats)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  storage.block_ip(ip_address, :critical_threat, duration)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  log_security_event(:critical_threat_blocked, context.merge(
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    action_taken: "blocked",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    duration_minutes: duration
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  ))
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  notify_security_team(:critical_threat, context)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                def handle_high_threat(context)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  ip_address = context[:ip]
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  threats = context[:threats] || []
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  duration = config.block_durations.high_threat
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  storage.block_ip(ip_address, :high_threat, duration)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    action_taken: "blocked",
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    duration_minutes: duration
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67.

      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  notify_security_team(:high_threat, context)

    70. 
            

            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71.

                def handle_medium_threat(context)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  log_security_event(:suspicious_activity, context.merge(
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    action_taken: "logged"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  ))

                def handle_brute_force_attack(context)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  ip_address = context[:ip_address]

    83. 
            

            

                  duration = config.block_durations.brute_force
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  storage.block_ip(ip_address, :brute_force, duration)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  log_security_event(:brute_force_blocked, context.merge(
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    action_taken: "blocked",
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    duration_minutes: duration
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  ))
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92.

                  notify_security_team(:brute_force_attack, context)

                def handle_successful_login(context)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  ip_address = context[:ip_address]
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  email = context[:email]
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  storage.reset_failed_logins(ip_address, email)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  log_security_event(:successful_login, context)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                def handle_failed_login(context)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  log_security_event(:failed_login, context)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  failed_count = context[:failed_count] || 0
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  if failed_count >= config.thresholds.failed_logins
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    notify_security_team(:login_threshold_exceeded, context)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                def determine_severity_from_context(context)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  threats = context[:threats] || []
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  return context[:severity] if context[:severity]
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  return :critical if critical_threats?(threats)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  return :high if high_threats?(threats)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  :medium
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                def determine_block_duration(threats)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  return config.block_durations.sql_injection if threats.include?(:sql_injection)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  return config.block_durations.path_traversal if threats.include?(:path_traversal)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  config.block_durations.critical_threat
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                def critical_threats?(threats)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  threats.include?(:sql_injection) || threats.include?(:path_traversal)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                def high_threats?(threats)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  threats.include?(:rapid_requests) && threats.length > 1
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                def log_security_event(event_type, details)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  log_level = determine_log_level(event_type)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  log_data = {
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    event: "security_#{event_type}",
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    **details
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  case log_level
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  when :fatal
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.fatal(log_data.to_json)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  when :error
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error(log_data.to_json)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  when :warn
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn(log_data.to_json)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info(log_data.to_json)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                def notify_security_team(notification_type, details)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  # TODO: Slack
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  # REF: docs/development_plan.md - 
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  # - AdminNotificationService.security_alert(notification_type, details)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  # - SlackNotificationService.send_alert(notification_type, details)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  # - EmailNotificationService.send_security_alert(notification_type, details)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  # - PagerDutyService.send_incident(notification_type, details) # 
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  # - SentryService.capture_security_event(notification_type, details) # 
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  notification_data = {
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    event: "security_notification",
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    notification_type: notification_type,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    **details
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  }
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn(notification_data.to_json)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                def determine_log_level(event_type)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  case event_type
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  when :critical_threat_blocked, :critical_threat
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    :fatal
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  when :brute_force_blocked, :brute_force_detected, :high_threat_blocked
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    :error
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  when :failed_login, :suspicious_activity, :medium_threat
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    :warn
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  else
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    :info
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            end
          
      193.

    app/lib/security/security_storage.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    129 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 129 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1.

                def initialize(config: SecurityConfig.instance)

                  @config = config

                def increment_counter(key, expiry: 60)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  redis = get_redis_connection
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless redis
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    count = redis.incr(key)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    redis.expire(key, expiry) if count == 1
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    count
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Storage increment error: #{e.message}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    0
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31.

                def is_blocked?(ip_address)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  redis = get_redis_connection
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  return false unless redis
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    blocked_keys = redis.keys("#{config.redis_keys[:blocked]}:*:#{ip_address}")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    blocked_keys.any? { |key| redis.exists?(key) }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Storage blocked check error: #{e.message}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    false
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                def block_ip(ip_address, reason, duration_minutes)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  redis = get_redis_connection
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  return false unless redis
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    block_key = "#{config.redis_keys[:blocked]}:#{reason}:#{ip_address}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    block_data = build_block_data(reason, duration_minutes)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    redis.setex(block_key, duration_minutes * 60, block_data.to_json)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    true
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Storage block IP error: #{e.message}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    false
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                def delete_key(key)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  redis = get_redis_connection
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  return false unless redis
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    redis.del(key) > 0
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Storage delete error: #{e.message}"
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    false
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72.

                def get_failed_login_count(ip_address, email)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  redis = get_redis_connection
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless redis
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    key = "#{config.redis_keys[:failed_logins]}:#{ip_address}:#{email}"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    redis.get(key).to_i
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Storage failed login count error: #{e.message}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    0
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                end
          
      97.

                def reset_failed_logins(ip_address, email)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  key = "#{config.redis_keys[:failed_logins]}:#{ip_address}:#{email}"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  delete_key(key)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102.

                def increment_failed_logins(ip_address, email, expiry: 3600)
          
      104.

                  key = "#{config.redis_keys[:failed_logins]}:#{ip_address}:#{email}"

                def get_redis_connection
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  return mock_redis if Rails.env.test? && defined?(MockRedis)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  if Rails.env.test?
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    return nil unless defined?(Redis)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      redis = Redis.current
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      redis.ping
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      return redis
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Redis not available in test environment: #{e.message}"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      return nil
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    if defined?(Sidekiq) && Sidekiq.redis_pool
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      Sidekiq.redis { |conn| return conn }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    else
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      Redis.current
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Redis connection failed: #{e.message}"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    nil
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                def mock_redis
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  @mock_redis ||= MockRedis.new if defined?(MockRedis)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142.

                def build_block_data(reason, duration_minutes)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  {
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    blocked_at: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    reason: reason,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    duration_minutes: duration_minutes,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    blocked_until: (Time.current + duration_minutes.minutes).iso8601
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  }
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                def update_hourly_stats
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  hour_key = "#{config.redis_keys[:stats_requests]}:#{Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d%H')}"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  count = increment_counter(hour_key, expiry: 25.hours.to_i)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  count
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                def update_ip_stats(ip_address)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  ip_key = "#{config.redis_keys[:stats_ip]}:#{ip_address}:#{Date.current.strftime('%Y%m%d')}"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  count = increment_counter(ip_key, expiry: 2.days.to_i)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  count
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

            end

                SUSPICIOUS_USER_AGENTS = [
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  /sqlmap/i, /nikto/i, /nmap/i, /masscan/i,

                # SQL

                SQL_INJECTION_PATTERNS = [
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  /(\s|^)(select|insert|update|delete|drop|create|alter)\s/i,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  /(\s|^)(union|where|having|order\s+by)\s/i,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  /(\s|^)(and|or)\s+1\s*=\s*1/i,
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  /\'[\s]*or[\s]*\'.*\'[\s]*=[\s]*\'/i,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  /\"\s*or\s*\"\s*=\s*\"/i,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

      30.

                PATH_TRAVERSAL_PATTERNS = [
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  /\.\.[\/\\]/,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36.

                ].freeze

                def initialize(config: SecurityConfig.instance, storage: nil)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  @config = config
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  @storage = storage || SecurityStorage.new(config: @config)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                def detect_threats(request)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  client_ip = extract_client_ip(request)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # IP
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  return [] if whitelisted_ip?(client_ip)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  threats = []
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  threats << :rapid_requests if rapid_requests?(client_ip)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  threats << :suspicious_user_agent if suspicious_user_agent?(request.user_agent)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  threats << :path_traversal if path_traversal?(request.path)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  threats << :sql_injection if sql_injection?(request)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  threats << :large_request if large_request?(request)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  threats
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                def determine_severity(threats)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  return :critical if critical_threats?(threats)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  return :high if high_threats?(threats)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  :medium
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                private
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                def rapid_requests?(ip_address)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  count = storage.increment_counter(
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    "#{config.redis_keys[:request_count]}:#{ip_address}",
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    expiry: 60
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  )
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  count > config.thresholds.rapid_requests
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                def suspicious_user_agent?(user_agent)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  return true if user_agent.blank?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  SUSPICIOUS_USER_AGENTS.any? { |pattern| user_agent.match?(pattern) }
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                def path_traversal?(path)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  PATH_TRAVERSAL_PATTERNS.any? { |pattern| path.match?(pattern) }
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                def sql_injection?(request)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  content_to_check = build_content_string(request)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  SQL_INJECTION_PATTERNS.any? { |pattern| content_to_check.match?(pattern) }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                def large_request?(request)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  content_length = request.content_length
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  return false unless content_length
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  content_length > config.thresholds.request_size
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                def build_content_string(request)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  query_string = request.query_string
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  request_body = extract_request_body(request)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  [ query_string, request_body, request.path ].compact.join(" ")
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                def extract_request_body(request)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  return nil unless request.content_length && request.content_length > 0
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  return nil if request.content_length > 1.megabyte
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    request.body.read(1.megabyte)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Failed to read request body: #{e.message}"
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    nil
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  ensure
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    request.body.rewind if request.body.respond_to?(:rewind)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                def extract_client_ip(request)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  request.env["HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR"]&.split(",")&.first&.strip ||
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    request.env["HTTP_X_REAL_IP"] ||
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    request.remote_ip
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                def whitelisted_ip?(ip_address)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  config.whitelist_ips.include?(ip_address)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                def critical_threats?(threats)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  threats.include?(:sql_injection) || threats.include?(:path_traversal)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                def high_threats?(threats)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  threats.include?(:rapid_requests) && threats.length > 1
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            end

            class SecurityMonitor

              def initialize(
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                detector: nil,
          
      20.

                @config = config || Security::SecurityConfig.instance

              def self.analyze_request(request, response = nil)

              def analyze_request(request, response = nil)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                return [] if storage.is_blocked?(extract_client_ip(request))
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                threats = detector.detect_threats(request)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                if threats.any?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  severity = detector.determine_severity(threats)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51.

      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  context = {
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    ip: client_ip,

    55. 
            

            

                    threats: threats,

      63.

                  event_handler.handle_threat(severity, context)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                end
          
      65.

      66.

                #

              def block_ip(ip_address, reason, duration_minutes = nil)

    101. 
            

            

                duration = duration_minutes || config.block_durations[reason] || 60

              def csv_import_complete(admin, import_result)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                @admin = admin
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                @valid_count = import_result[:valid_count]
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @invalid_count = import_result[:invalid_records]&.size || 0
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                mail(
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  **admin_mail_defaults(admin),
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25.

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                                  valid_count: @valid_count,
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                                  invalid_count: @invalid_count)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                )

    39.

      85.

      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86.

              # 
          
      184.

              def validate_email_content
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                # 
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                if subject.blank?
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, ""
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                end
          
      189.

                if mail.to.blank?

    57.

    59.

    60.
