              def process_return(shipment_id, return_quantity, reason = nil, quality_check = true)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                shipment = shipments.find_by(id: shipment_id)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                return false unless shipment
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                return false if return_quantity <= 0 || return_quantity > shipment.quantity
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # 
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                unless shipment.shipped? || shipment.delivered?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # 
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                shipment.update(
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  shipment_status: :returned,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  return_quantity: return_quantity,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  return_reason: reason,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  return_date: Date.current
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                )
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                #

    106. 
            

            

                if quality_check

    107. 
            

            

                  add_stock(return_quantity, ": #{reason || ''}")
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110.

                true

              class_methods do

                # 
          
      115.

                def ship(inventory_id, quantity, options = {})
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  inventory = find(inventory_id)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  if inventory.quantity < quantity
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    raise ": #{inventory.quantity}, : #{quantity}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  inventory.quantity -= quantity
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  note = options[:note] || ""
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    inventory.save!
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    InventoryLog.create!(
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                      inventory_id: inventory.id,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      delta: -quantity,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      operation_type: "ship",
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      previous_quantity: inventory.quantity + quantity,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                      current_quantity: inventory.quantity,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      user_id: options[:user_id],
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                      note: note,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      reference_number: options[:reference_number],
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      destination: options[:destination]
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    )
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                # 
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                def receive(inventory_id, quantity, options = {})
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  inventory = find(inventory_id)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  inventory.quantity += quantity
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  note = options[:note] || ""
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    inventory.save!
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    InventoryLog.create!(
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                      inventory_id: inventory.id,
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                      delta: quantity,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                      operation_type: "receive",
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      previous_quantity: inventory.quantity - quantity,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      current_quantity: inventory.quantity,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      user_id: options[:user_id],
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      note: note,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                      reference_number: options[:reference_number],
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                      source: options[:source]
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    )
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                # +
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                def transfer(from_id, to_id, quantity, options = {})
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  from_inventory = find(from_id)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  to_inventory = find(to_id)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  if from_inventory.quantity < quantity
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    raise ": #{from_inventory.quantity}, : #{quantity}"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  logs = []
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    ship_options = options.merge(note: ": #{from_inventory.name}  #{to_inventory.name}")
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    logs << ship(from_id, quantity, ship_options)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    receive_options = options.merge(note: ": #{from_inventory.name}  #{to_inventory.name}")
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    logs << receive(to_id, quantity, receive_options)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  logs
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                # 
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                def shipments_by_period(start_date, end_date)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  joins(:shipments)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    .where("shipments.scheduled_date BETWEEN ? AND ?", start_date, end_date)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    .group("inventories.id")
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    .select("inventories.*, COUNT(shipments.id) as shipment_count, SUM(shipments.quantity) as total_shipped")
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                # 
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                def receipts_by_period(start_date, end_date)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  joins(:receipts)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    .where("receipts.receipt_date BETWEEN ? AND ?", start_date, end_date)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    .group("inventories.id")
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    .select("inventories.*, COUNT(receipts.id) as receipt_count, SUM(receipts.quantity) as total_received")
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                # 
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                def movement_report(start_date, end_date, options = {})
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  shipped = joins(:inventory_logs)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                            .where(inventory_logs: {
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                              operation_type: "ship",
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                              created_at: start_date.beginning_of_day..end_date.end_of_day
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                            })
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                            .distinct
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  received = joins(:inventory_logs)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                            .where(inventory_logs: {
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                              operation_type: "receive",
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                              created_at: start_date.beginning_of_day..end_date.end_of_day
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                            })
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                            .distinct
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  # ID
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  all_ids = (shipped.pluck(:id) + received.pluck(:id)).uniq
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  # N+1
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  inventories_hash = Inventory.where(id: all_ids).index_by(&:id)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  report_data = all_ids.map do |id|
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                    inventory = inventories_hash[id]
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                    next unless inventory
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    ship_logs = InventoryLog.where(
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                      inventory_id: id,
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                      operation_type: "ship",
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                      created_at: start_date.beginning_of_day..end_date.end_of_day
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                    )
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                    receive_logs = InventoryLog.where(
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                      inventory_id: id,
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                      operation_type: "receive",
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                      created_at: start_date.beginning_of_day..end_date.end_of_day
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                    )
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    total_shipped = ship_logs.sum(:delta).abs
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                    total_received = receive_logs.sum(:delta)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    {
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                      id: id,
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                      name: inventory.name,
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                      code: inventory.code,
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                      shipped_quantity: total_shipped,
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                      received_quantity: total_received,
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                      net_change: total_received - total_shipped,
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                      ship_count: ship_logs.count,
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                      receive_count: receive_logs.count
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    }
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  end.compact
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                  if options[:sort_by]
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                    field = options[:sort_by].to_sym
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                    direction = options[:sort_direction] == :desc ? -1 : 1
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                    report_data.sort_by! { |item| direction * (item[field] || 0) }
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  {
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                    start_date: start_date,
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                    end_date: end_date,
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                    total_shipped: report_data.sum { |item| item[:shipped_quantity] },
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                    total_received: report_data.sum { |item| item[:received_quantity] },
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                    net_change: report_data.sum { |item| item[:net_change] },
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                    items: report_data
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  }
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                end
          
      292.

              def self.set_batch_operation(job_name, reason = nil)

            class Inventory < ApplicationRecord
          
      6.

              #

              include Auditable

            class InventoryLog < ApplicationRecord
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              belongs_to :inventory
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              belongs_to :user, optional: true
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # 
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              validates :delta, presence: true, numericality: true
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              validates :operation_type, presence: true
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              validates :previous_quantity, presence: true, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              validates :current_quantity, presence: true, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # 
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              OPERATION_TYPES = %w[add remove adjust ship receive].freeze
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # enumRails 8 
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              enum :operation_type, {
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                add: "add",
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                remove: "remove",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                adjust: "adjust",
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                ship: "ship",
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                receive: "receive"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              # 
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              scope :by_operation_type, ->(type) { where(operation_type: type) }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              scope :by_date_range, ->(start_date, end_date) {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                start_date = start_date.beginning_of_day if start_date
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end_date = end_date.end_of_day if end_date
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                query = all
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                query = query.where("created_at >= ?", start_date) if start_date
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                query = query.where("created_at <= ?", end_date) if end_date
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                query
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # 
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              scope :additions, -> { by_operation_type("add") }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              scope :removals, -> { by_operation_type("remove") }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              scope :adjustments, -> { by_operation_type("adjust") }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              scope :shipments, -> { by_operation_type("ship") }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              scope :receipts, -> { by_operation_type("receive") }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              scope :this_month, -> { by_date_range(Time.current.beginning_of_month, Time.current) }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              scope :previous_month, -> { by_date_range(1.month.ago.beginning_of_month, 1.month.ago.end_of_month) }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              scope :this_year, -> { by_date_range(Time.current.beginning_of_year, Time.current) }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              # 
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              validates :operation_type, inclusion: { in: OPERATION_TYPES }

              def self.csv_header
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                %w[ID ID       ]
          
      87.

              def csv_row
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                [
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  id,
          
      93.

                  inventory_id,

    99.

    100. 
            

            

                  created_at.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")

              # CSV

              def self.generate_csv(logs)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                CSV.generate(headers: true) do |csv|
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  csv << csv_header
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  logs.each do |log|
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    csv << log.csv_row
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113.

              end

              # 
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              def self.operation_summary(start_date = 30.days.ago, end_date = Time.current)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                by_date_range(start_date, end_date)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  .group(:operation_type)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  .select("operation_type, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(ABS(delta)) as total_quantity")
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def self.daily_transaction_summary(days = 30)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                start_date = days.days.ago.beginning_of_day
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                by_date_range(start_date, Time.current)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  .group("DATE(created_at)")
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  .select("DATE(created_at) as date, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(ABS(delta)) as total_quantity")
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  .order("date DESC")
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              def self.top_products_by_activity(limit = 10, days = 30)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                start_date = days.days.ago.beginning_of_day
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                joins(:inventory)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  .by_date_range(start_date, Time.current)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  .group("inventory_id, inventories.name")
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  .select("inventory_id, inventories.name, COUNT(*) as operation_count")
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  .order("operation_count DESC")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  .limit(limit)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142.

              def formatted_created_at
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                created_at.strftime("%Y%m%d %H:%M:%S")
          
      170.

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              # 
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def operation_display_name
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                case operation_type
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                when "add" then ""
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                when "remove" then ""
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                when "adjust" then ""
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                when "ship" then ""
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                when "receive" then ""
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                else operation_type
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            end
          
      184.

    app/models/receipt.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    29 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 29 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class Receipt < ApplicationRecord
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              belongs_to :inventory
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Rails 8 
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              enum :receipt_status, {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                expected: 0,     # 
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                partial: 1,      # 
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                completed: 2,    # 
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                rejected: 3,     # 
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                delayed: 4       # 
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              }
          
      14.

              #

              validates :quantity, presence: true, numericality: { greater_than: 0 }

                return nil unless cost_per_unit

            class SearchQuery

                def call(params)

    7. 
            

            

                  query = Inventory.all
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9.

                  # 
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  if params[:q].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    query = query.where("name LIKE ?", "%#{params[:q]}%")
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  order_column = "updated_at"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27.

    app/validators/password_strength_validator.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            #

    4. 
            

            

            class PasswordStrengthValidator < ActiveModel::EachValidator
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              DIGIT_REGEX = /\d/.freeze
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              LOWER_REGEX = /[a-z]/.freeze
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              UPPER_REGEX = /[A-Z]/.freeze
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              SYMBOL_REGEX = /[^A-Za-z0-9]/.freeze
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              def validate_each(record, attribute, value)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                return if value.nil?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # devisevalidatabale
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                min_length = options[:min_length] || 12
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                if value.length < min_length
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, :too_short, count: min_length)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # 
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if options[:digit] != false && !value.match?(DIGIT_REGEX)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, :missing_digit)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # 
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                if options[:lower] != false && !value.match?(LOWER_REGEX)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, :missing_lower)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # 
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                if options[:upper] != false && !value.match?(UPPER_REGEX)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, :missing_upper)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # 
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                if options[:symbol] != false && !value.match?(SYMBOL_REGEX)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, :missing_symbol)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            end
          
      40.
